title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2016 + PTE Patch Update 1.0
description:
Pro Evolution Soccer 2016 + PTE Patch Update 1.0 (UPLOAD BY DAKA LOODAK)

PES16 PTE Patch Update 1.0 - RELEASED 06/10/2015

Download PES2016 PTE Patch Update 1.0

Features:

â€“ 1. Bundesliga fully licensed â€“ Correct squads, lineups, names, logos & kits (Including 3rd kits & combinations)

â€“ Transfers, lineups and numbers updated â€“ Attention that, the transfers are not all made, we just use players that are already in the game. More to come after the Live Update be decrypted.

â€“ Correct icons and radar colors for all the kits added (except for the American, Asian & African National Teams)

â€“ Patch compatible Online â€“ You can choose between â€œDefault Onlineâ€ mode or â€œLicensed Onlineâ€ mode in the selector
